nodes.body: I don't have a problem with automating it, though if we just do it once every couple months, it doesn't seem like a huge deal.
Not sure why my exp branch doesn't trriger the build pipeline.  But verify the fix in https://devdiv.visualstudio.com/DevDiv/_build/results?buildId=7370040&view=results

> Although this feel like something that should be done automatically by maestro via appropriate arcade subscription flow. @rainersigwald - does it feel like worth approaching? Or are there reasons not to?

Maestro does not support upgrading to released versions, only internal builds, so it's not possible to use it here. I think Dependabot can update SDK versions but Arcade has us use them in a nonstandard way so it doesn't apply to us either.

I wouldn't _mind_ automation but building it as a one-off sounds annoying.

Oh I see - makes sense. I wasn't aware of those limitations
one-off is not worth it
